title: structMap
name: structMap
description:
Calls the given closure with every element in the given struct.
		the function returns a struct that contains all values returned by the closure.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: filter can be a function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(string key, any value[, struct struct]):any].

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
